author: PlayStation
description:
In Sacred 2 Remaster, you step into the world of Ancaria as one of six heroes. Explore a massive open world and master combat arts and spells for epic loot. This remaster brings a fan-favorite back to life — with hi-res textures, better combat and bugfixes, for longtime fans and newcomers alike.

#ps5 #ps5games #sacred2
title: Sacred 2 Remaster - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
What shall we do with Flying Dutchman? 

The clash between King Neptune and the Flying Dutchman has unleashed ghostly mayhem across Bikini Bottom. By the power of BFFs, join SpongeBob and Patrick on their ghostliest adventure yet to once again save Bikini Bottom!

Pre-Order now and get the Natural Costume Pack for SpongeBob and Patrick!

SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is coming to PlayStation 5 on November 18th!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

description:

The boat offers little protection from the horrors ahead, but The Orphans are in it together whether they like it or not.

REANIMAL is the new game by Tarsier Studios, the original creators of Little Nightmares 1 & Little NIghtmares 2.

REANIMAL will come to PlayStation 5.

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-eternal-life-of-goldman/

A mother tells her child a twisted fairy tale about Goldman until delicate emotions from her own checkered past begin to resurface...

In this breathtaking platformer adventure, explore a vast hand-drawn Archipelago, inspired by ancient fables and depicted in classic frame-by-frame animation, and defeat a mysterious Deity.

The Eternal Life of Goldman is coming to PlayStation 5! 

#ps5 #ps5games #TheEternalLifeOfGoldman
title: The Eternal Life of Goldman - Can Fairy Tales Hurt? Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015068

In Tides of Tomorrow, you’ll head out on a journey to find a cure for a fatal disease before everything is lost!

Every choice leaves a mark. Follow in the steps of a friend, a streamer or a total stranger and live the impacts of their decisions through your own story! And yes, you can also play solo, thanks to our offline journeys available at launch!

Tides of Tomorrow is coming to PlayStation 5 on February 24, 2026.

#ps5 #ps5games #TidesOfTomorrow #THQNordic2025
title: Tides of Tomorrow - Showcase 2025 Trailer | PS5 Games

What's that twang? Grand Prix Winner at Tokyo Game Show 2024 SOWN, Esophaguys is out now on PS5! Play as old folks with elongating necks! With 1-4 players, stretch, bite, and swing your way through co-op, minigame, story, and hardcore modes! Featuring the world's first soundscape composed of elderly grunts and twanging tones.

author: PlayStation
description:
http://play.fn.gg/island/7024-5026-8823

Two cities. One unforgettable ride. 

Dive into the new PARTYNEXTDOOR Fortnite Event to experience a jet-setting adventure from Toronto to Miami. With exciting virtual performances from the R&B singer, the concert event will include hit songs, "Break From Toronto", "M a k e I t T o T h e M o r n i n g" and "SOMEBODY LOVES ME".

Tune in to the PARTYNEXTDOOR Fortnite Event starting August, 1st at 1pm ET. Island Code: 7024-5026-8823.

Created by Sony Immersive Music Studios in partnership with OVO Sound.

#playstation #fortnite #partynextdoor #ovo #ovosound
title: PARTYNEXTDOOR x Fortnite Concert | PlayStation

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EP3176-PPSA28132_00-0695069279131057

Upin & Ipin Universe is a vibrant open-world adventure that brings the charm of tropical Southeast Asian village life to players worldwide.

Inspired by the beloved Upin & Ipin animated series, it invites players to explore the lively Kampung Durian Runtuh — a living, breathing world filled with authentic sights, sounds, and traditions, crafted by Malaysians for the world.

From bustling markets to quiet rice fields, it captures the essence of kampung (village) life—fireflies at dusk, swaying coconut palms, and the aroma of home-cooked meals. Play as Upin and Ipin on a heartfelt journey, uncovering local legends, helping their community, and immersing themselves in Malaysia’s rich culture, rooted in the heart of Southeast Asia.

Available now on Playstation

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Upin & Ipin Universe - Out Now | PS5 & PS4 Games
